header.title: DSA & System Design Bootcamp
header.desc: FAANG instructor’s blended learning course with video lessons and live doubt sessions and live project sessions to crack Software Developer interview in any product base company.
header.firstPoint: DSA: Arrays, Sorting, Trees, DP, Linked Lists, Graphs, Advanced Structures.
header.secondPoint: System Design: Intro, Scalability, API, Load Balancer, HLD, LLD.
header.thirdPoint: Advanced DSA: LRU Cache, Adv. Trees, DP Optimization.
header.fourthPoint: Design Components: Storage, Cache, CDN, Load Balancer, Scalability, Queues, CAP Theorem.

Module0.title: Module 1 - Data Structures and Algorithms
Module0.desc: This module helps you to master the algorithms and data structures interview in FAANG & top product based MNCs. You will be solving 250+ coding challenges under guidance of expert mentors working in Tier 1 companies like Microsoft, Amazon, Adobe, Facebook, Google etc.

desc: Array basics, Problem solving techniques with example
